aboutMe.headline: About Me
aboutMe.text: Hey there, I'm Tobias. Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills? Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? Let's connect and create something amazing together!

skills.headline: Core Competencies
skills.text: Emphasise that you have used a variety of front-end technologies in your projects. Where have you used these skills: static or dynamic websites, responsive layouts, data visualization interfaces, smooth user experiences?

hiddenMenu.headline: Don't see the skill you are looking for?
hiddenMenu.text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge. Also I have a special interest in learning:

hiddenMenu.headline: Nicht die passende Fähigkeit gefunden?
hiddenMenu.text: Melden Sie sich gerne bei mir. Ich freue mich darauf, mein Wissen weiter auszubauen. Besonders interessiert bin ich an folgenden Lernfeldern:
